mapper.sql: select sd.* from sys_dept sd where sd.deleted = 0 order by sd.sort, sd.created_time desc

choose.when: select sd.id, sd.created_time createdTime, sd.name, sd.parent_id parentId, sd.sort, sd.status, case when sd.id in (select id from () t) then true else false end as checked from sys_dept sd where sd.deleted = 0

mapper.select: SELECT id FROM sys_dept WHERE id = #{deptId} OR ancestors LIKE concat('%,', #{deptId}, ',%') OR ancestors LIKE concat(#{deptId}, ',%') OR ancestors LIKE concat('%,', #{deptId})
